Package com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.wifi

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionWifiListener
    This interface allows to define callback functions for the wifi connection process.
    WifiAdHocManager.ListenerPeer  
    WifiAdHocManager.ServiceDiscoverListener  
    WifiAdHocManager.WifiDeviceInfosListener  
    WifiClient.ListenerAutoConnect  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    WifiAdHocDevice
    This class represents a remote Wi-Fi-enabled device.
    WifiAdHocManager
    This class manages the Wi-Fi discovery and the pairing with other Wi-FI devices.
    WifiClient
    This class defines the client's logic for bluetooth implementation.
    WiFiDirectBroadcastConnection
    This class defines a BroadcastReceiver that notifies of important wifi p2p events.
    WiFiDirectBroadcastDiscovery
    This class defines a BroadcastReceiver that notifies of important wifi p2p events.
    WifiServer
    This class defines the server's logic for wifi implementation.
